/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. A concrete overpass stretches across the street, hinting at the city's infrastructure. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, adding to the urban feel of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the overpass and gives a sense of depth to the image. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes standing out against the blue sky.
